title: Does L&T Technology Services provide accommodation? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes it does but at select locations only. All the people coming for training in Mysore selected from campus are given free stay and food at sandeepani an art of state building in L&T technology services Mysore. After that when u are given your postings you will get 7 days of extra stay but no food. If you are at Vadodara or Mumbai location you can avail the facility of hostel for unmarried at cost of 2500 INR for one more year but after that you have to search your stay.

This was in 2012 During Training- yes, they do provide a facility to stay. Free of cost. My training was in Bombay. We stayed in Borivali east. Training place: Madh Island. As per my knowledge tis free. When posted- They provide a place for a couple of weeks until you find a place for yourself. Free ! My posting- Chennai. Place provided- Ginger hotel(dunno the area)
